729401f-a.text:
Richmond Road, west side, adjoining (to the north) Raritan Avenue. The old 1 1/2 -story frame house, with the barn, is the Girard (Giraud) property. Also shown is an exposure of serpentine rock.
February 17, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729401f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Raritan Avenue, Staten Island, NY
